pyramid.plunder

Class Weapon

  • java.lang.Object
    • pyramid.plunder.Weapon
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SmallGun, Sword

    public abstract class Weapon
extends java.lang.Object
    In this weapon class, the multiple randomly generated weapons are selected and available for the user to use; gives characteristics for the weapons being used; defines the size and locations of the weapons while setting the attack damage.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Draw(java.awt.Graphics g)
      This Draw Method is passed down Graphics g; cooldown is used.
      boolean inRange(PhysicsObject p, int[] playerLoc, int[] playerSize)
      This boolean method is passed down PhysicsObbject p, int playerLoc, and int playerSize; here the location and size of the weapon are given boundaries.
      static int priceWeapon(Weapon w)
      This int priceWeapon method is passed down Weapon w; various mathematical computations are made through the float and pow; when the numbers correctly match the weapon, the specific weapon is selected.
      static Weapon randomWeapon()
      This Draw Method is passed down Graphics g; various mathematical computations are made for the random weapon to be selected.
      boolean use()
      This boolean method use gives characteristics for the weapons being used; it defines the keys needed to be used in order for the user to use the spirte of the weapon.

    • Method Detail

      • use

        public boolean use()
        This boolean method use gives characteristics for the weapons being used; it defines the keys needed to be used in order for the user to use the spirte of the weapon. It defines the size and locations of the weapons while setting the attack damage.

      • inRange

        public boolean inRange(PhysicsObject p,
              int[] playerLoc,
              int[] playerSize)
        This boolean method is passed down PhysicsObbject p, int playerLoc, and int playerSize; here the location and size of the weapon are given boundaries.

      • Draw

        public void Draw(java.awt.Graphics g)
        This Draw Method is passed down Graphics g; cooldown is used.

      • randomWeapon

        public static Weapon randomWeapon()
        This Draw Method is passed down Graphics g; various mathematical computations are made for the random weapon to be selected.

      • priceWeapon

        public static int priceWeapon(Weapon w)
        This int priceWeapon method is passed down Weapon w; various mathematical computations are made through the float and pow; when the numbers correctly match the weapon, the specific weapon is selected.
